alert.note: Alert for Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN PINE COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 352 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine City, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Pea to half inch hail and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hinckley around 410 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and will likely reduce visibility on parts of Interstate 35 south of Hinckley.
